Books published for the use of the Bay View Reading Club

repository.corpname: Bentley Historical Library, University of Michigan

acqinfo.p: The provenance of this collection is unknown.

accruals.p: No further additions to the collection are expected.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open to research.

userestrict.p: Copyright has not been transferred to the Regents of the University of Michigan.

prefercite.p: [item], folder, box, Books published for the use of the Bay View Reading Club, Bentley Historical Library, University of Michigan

bioghist.p: The Bay View Reading Club was a program of the Bay View Association. Also known as the Bay View Reading Circle, the club flourished in the period of 1893-1921.

scopecontent.p: This is a collection of books published for the use of the Bay View Reading Club. The books have been listed alphabetically by author.

did.unittitle: Books published for the use of the Bay View Reading Club

Bryce, James. South America: Observations and Impressions. 1912 (Macmillan)
Carson, W. E. Mexico: The Wonderland of the South. 1913 (Macmillan)

Clough, Ethlyn T., Oriental Life: An Account of Past and Contemporary Conditions and Progress in Asia, Excepting China, India and Japan. 1910
Clough, Ethlyn T., South American Life: An Account of Past and Contemporary Conditions and Progress in South America. 1912

Hall, John M., ed. England: An Account of Past and Contemporary Conditions and Progress. Reprint. 1914

Parmalee, Mary Platt. A Short History of Rome and Italy. 1908 (Scribner's)
Parmalee, Mary Platt. A Short History of Russia. 1899 (Continental)
Parmalee, Mary Platt. The Story of Spain Briefly Told. 1898 (Continental)
Parry, Emma Louise. Life Among the Germans. 1887 (Lathrop)
